comments:
In the Java Editor, I was in the following line:
    Map<PpmMedia, String> parallelVersions = new HashMap();
when I chose Ctrl+1 and picked "Add type parameters to 'HashMap'" on the HashMap constructor. That resulted in the following NPE:
